txt.en: Gundabad war-trolls can be found at Azgh-buzru.\n\nNáin has asked you to defeat roaming war-trolls of Gundabad at Azgh-buzru.

'I have one more task for you.

'I have received word that Gorgar has deployed a number of his war-trolls to guard the approach to Mount Gundabad. However, I have reason to believe that they have also been sent to uncover our position. If Drenghól were to be discovered, it would deal a devastating blow to our offensive.

'Slay them for the good of the Gabil'akkâ!

'And, [placeholder], these war-trolls do not travel alone — neither should you.'
Náin the Slakeless can be found at Drenghól in the War of Three Peaks.\n\nYou have defeated many of the roaming war-trolls of Gundabad at Azgh-buzru. You should return to Náin.
'I have no doubt Gorgar will soon send more of his trolls into the war-fell, but each one we defeat serves to guard our position.\n\n'You have my thanks, [placeholder].'
Deployed to protect the gates of Mount Gundabad and uncover the hidden refuge of Drenghól, mighty trolls roam the war-fell of Azgh-buzru.
